titleStmt.title: Of the vvood called guaiacum that healeth the Frenche pockes, and also healeth the goute in the feete, the stoone, the palsey, lepree, dropsy, fallynge euyll, and other dyseases.
De guaiaci medicina. English
titleStmt.author: Hutten, Ulrich von, 1488-1523.
Paynell, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: The name of the author, Ulrich Hutten, and the translator, Thomas Paynell, both appear on leaf pi2r.
A translation of: De guaiaci medicina.
Running title reads: De morbo gallico.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
